welcome_message_body: Welcome to Iligan, the City of Majestic Waterfalls! Get ready to be mesmerized by the beauty of our cascading falls and the warmth of our people. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: B-Bu-Q
restaurants.description: B-Bu-Q is a bbq joint located in Iligan.
restaurants.address: Pala-o, Iligan City, 9200 Iligan City, Lanao del Norte
